en.about: I consider myself a curious person. I enjoy participating in new projects and learning new things. The world of engineering has given me the opportunity to explore many different fields, such as mechanical design, project management, electronics, or programming. It motivates me to participate in projects that have an impact beyond their functional purpose, especially related to the environment, cooperation and social change.
